akka.http.scaladsl.server.directives

Interface RespondWithDirectives

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Directives
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Directives$, HttpApp, RespondWithDirectives$

    public interface RespondWithDirectives

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Directive<scala.runtime.BoxedUnit> respondWithDefaultHeader(akka.http.scaladsl.model.HttpHeader responseHeader)
      Adds the given response header to all HTTP responses of its inner Route, if the response from the inner Route doesn't already contain a header with the same name.
      Directive<scala.runtime.BoxedUnit> respondWithDefaultHeaders(scala.collection.Seq<akka.http.scaladsl.model.HttpHeader> responseHeaders)
      Adds the given response headers to all HTTP responses of its inner Route, if a header already exists it is not added again.
      Directive<scala.runtime.BoxedUnit> respondWithDefaultHeaders(scala.collection.immutable.Seq<akka.http.scaladsl.model.HttpHeader> responseHeaders)
      Adds the given response headers to all HTTP responses of its inner Route, if a header already exists it is not added again.
      Directive<scala.runtime.BoxedUnit> respondWithHeader(akka.http.scaladsl.model.HttpHeader responseHeader)
      Unconditionally adds the given response header to all HTTP responses of its inner Route.
      Directive<scala.runtime.BoxedUnit> respondWithHeaders(scala.collection.Seq<akka.http.scaladsl.model.HttpHeader> responseHeaders)
      Unconditionally adds the given response headers to all HTTP responses of its inner Route.
      Directive<scala.runtime.BoxedUnit> respondWithHeaders(scala.collection.immutable.Seq<akka.http.scaladsl.model.HttpHeader> responseHeaders)
      Unconditionally adds the given response headers to all HTTP responses of its inner Route.
